alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 3:11PM MDT until June 10 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central El Paso County in east central Colorado... North central Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 310 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Hanover, or 20 miles southeast of Colorado Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hanover. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
